flavorText: The trainer awoke to begin the journey from the wurm's tail to its head. The sun was setting when she arrived.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Bändigerin erwachte, um zur Reise von der Schwanzspitze des Wurms zu seinem Kopf aufzubrechen. Die Sonne ging unter, als sie endlich dort ankam.
foreignData.name: Ureingesessener Wurm
foreignData.text:

foreignData.flavorText: La adiestradora se despertó y comenzó el viaje desde la cola de la sierpe hacia su cabeza. Cuando llegó, el sol se estaba poniendo.
foreignData.name: Sierpe primigenia
foreignData.text:
Convocar (Cada criatura que gires al jugar este hechizo reduce su coste en {1} o en un maná del color de esa criatura.)
Arrolla.

foreignData.flavorText: L'instructrice se réveilla et entama le long périple séparant la queue de la guivre de sa tête. Elle arriva au soleil couchant.
foreignData.name: Guivre autochtone
foreignData.text:
Convocation (Chaque créature que vous engagez en jouant ce sort réduit son coût de {1} ou d'un mana de la couleur de cette créature.)

foreignData.flavorText: L'addestratrice si svegliò, pronta a cominciare il viaggio che dalla coda del wurm l'avrebbe condotta fino alla testa. Il sole stava già tramontando quando arrivò.
foreignData.name: Wurm Aborigeno
foreignData.text:
Convocazione (Ciascuna creatura che TAPpi mentre giochi questa magia riduce il suo costo di {1} o di un mana del colore di quella creatura.)

foreignData.flavorText: 訓練官は目覚めると、ワームの尾から頭までの旅を始めた。 着く頃には日が暮れていた。
foreignData.name: 土着のワーム

foreignData.flavorText: Наставница встала с зарей, чтобы начать путешествие от хвоста вурма до его головы. Она завершила свой путь на закате.
foreignData.name: Первобытный вурм

foreignData.flavorText: 驯兽师醒来后，开始从亚龙的尾巴走向头部。 到了落日时分，她终于抵达目的地。

name: Autochthon Wurm
originalText:
Convoke (Each creature you tap while playing this spell reduces its cost by {1} or by one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample

rulings.text: You can tap any untapped creature you control to convoke a spell, even one you haven’t controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn.

When calculating a spell’s total cost, include any alternative costs, additional costs, or anything else that increases or reduces the cost to cast the spell. Convoke applies after the total cost is calculated. Convoke doesn’t change a spell’s mana cost or mana value.

If a creature you control has a mana ability with {T} in the cost, activating that ability while casting a spell with convoke will result in the creature being tapped before you pay the spell’s costs. You won’t be able to tap it again for convoke. Similarly, if you sacrifice a creature to activate a mana ability while casting a spell with convoke, that creature won’t be on the battlefield when you pay the spell’s costs, so you won’t be able to tap it for convoke.

text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Trample
